[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/room/inherit/terrain_map/air_base.c

Base inherit for an air room using the terrain map system.

This file should be inherited by any air room within a terrain mapped virtual area.

To inherit from this file, use the following lines:

  • #include
  • inherit TERRAIN_MAP_AIR_BASE

See also:
terrain_map_handler.c, terrain_map_intro.c and terrain_map_example.c

Written by Dek

Started Thurs April 12 2001 Too Damn Early BST

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/inherit/terrain_map/terrain_room.c and /std/room/outside.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/player_handler.h, /include/terrain_map.h, /include/login_handler.h and /include/room.h
